law.catch_line: Personal property is not subject to property tax if the property:...
law.text:
Personal property is not subject to property tax if the property:
is owned by a nonprofit organization that:
is qualified as tax exempt under § 501(c)(4) of the Internal Revenue Code; and
is engaged primarily in providing a program to render its best efforts to contain, clean up, and otherwise mitigate spills of oil or other substances occurring in United States coastal and tidal waters; and
is used for the purposes of the organization.
